author: Anonymous Poet
title: Can I change lab session for lab6?
question: Hi, I'm in L2C. But I'm really experiencing diarrhea today. Can I do lab6 by myself? Or can I go to another lab session this week?
student_answer: You can refer to the course syllabus! It has plenty of information on what to do.
instructor_answer: Please review the course syllabus, specifically the section on missing assignments.
